body:
Little is known of Kemper’s background or art training; however, he is known primarily for his landscapes typically depicting river valley settings.  He had made at least one excursion to the Adirondack Mountains and Lake George areas and is also known to have painted the scenic Ohio River Valley.  This appealing painting, titled simply “Landscape”, illustrates Kemper’s skill at capturing light and mood.

High auction record for this artist is $7,487.
dimensions: Oil on canvas, 13.5 x 20.5 inches / Signed lower right
metaTitle: Henry W. Kemper - Landscape Oil On Canvas Painting For Sale
metaDescription: Henry W. Kemper, American Artist From 1833-1894 - Landscape Oil On Canvas Painting For Sale - 13.5x20.5 Inches - Signed Lower Right.
title: Landscape
